divs: sighting detailsi stepped outside on the deck, behind the house, at 11:32pm est in kent city, michigan. i looked up and saw a blue\white large light moving across the sky from southwest to northeast. i saw it go below the clouds and then through the thin clouds. it looked like it was travelling maybe 50% faster than a commercial airline plane. it also seemed to curve slightly northward as it travelled. the light was maybe 20% dimmer than venus usually is and was approximately 4 times larger in diameter than venus appears. i only saw this one light all the way across the sky and no blinking lights of any kind. it did not change in intensity either, except for when it went through the thin clouds.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Kent City
There were no other sightings in Kent City on or around July 8th 2009
Summary: Blue/White light going across sky little dimmer than Venus
